LanguageData.CameraDolly.helpTexts.0: Farenin orta düğmesine-tekerleğe basılı tutup sürükleyerek veya WASD tuşları ile kamerayı hareket etirebilirsiniz.
LanguageData.Rescuing.helpTexts.0: Yaralı bir kolonisti kurtarmak için sağlıklı bir kolonisti seçip yaralının üzerine sağ-tıklayıp yaralı olduğunu bildirin.
LanguageData.Capturing.helpTexts.0: Bir düşman çaresiz durumda ise tutsak edebilirsiniz.
LanguageData.Capturing.helpTexts.1: Bir kolonisti seçip çaresiz düşmana sağ-tıklayıp "tutsak et" i seçebilirsiniz.\n\nYou'll need an extra bed marked for prisoner use.
LanguageData.InteractingWithTraders.helpTexts.0: Başlarındaki kişi ile görüşebilisin.\n\nBir kolonist seçerek ticaret ypacağınız kişiye sağ-tıklayın.
LanguageData.Drafting.helpTexts.0: To control colonists directly for combat, Draft them by selecting them and hitting the DRAFT button.
LanguageData.Drafting.helpTexts.1: A drafted colonist will do only what you tell them, and can only take combat actions. Those with weapons will use them when possible.\n\nDon't leave colonists Drafted forever - they'll starve and become unhappy.
LanguageData.AnimalsDontAttackDoors.helpTexts.0: Manhunting animals generally won't attack doors or inactive turrets.\n\nYou can escape them by getting inside or behind a wall. But they'll wait for you.
LanguageData.BillsTab.helpTexts.0: To make colonists work at a table, select the table and open the Bills tab. Here, you can say what meals to cook, what things to craft, what creatures to butcher.
LanguageData.TVForSickPeople.helpTexts.0: To entertain sick people in bed, set up a TV they can watch.
LanguageData.AnimalTraining.helpTexts.0: You can assign a tame animal to be trained in specific skills on its TRAINING tab.\n\nAnimals can't be trained continuously; they need time between training sessions.
LanguageData.StorageTabCategories.helpTexts.0: In the storage tab of a stockpile, you can expand categories to allow or deny specific items. Click the triangles to the left of category names.
LanguageData.Mining.helpTexts.0: You can designate where to mine by opening the ARCHITECT menu and selecting the ORDERS tab.\n\nSome mineable blocks yield STEEL, GOLD, PLASTEEL, and other useful materials.
LanguageData.HostilityResponse.helpTexts.0: You can configure how colonists should automatically respond to threats like predatory animals.\n\nChoose from FLEE, ATTACK, and IGNORE modes in the ASSIGN menu.
LanguageData.OpeningComms.helpTexts.0: To communicate, select a colonist and right-click on the comms console.
LanguageData.Deterioration.helpTexts.0: Items left outdoors will slowly deteriorate.\n\nIf you want to store items long-term, keep them under a roof.
LanguageData.InspectRoomStats.helpTexts.0: You can inspect the impressiveness, wealth, and beauty of individual rooms using the ROOM STATS INSPECT toggle in the bottom right.
LanguageData.ClickingMessages.helpTexts.0: You can click on the notifications in the top-left of the screen to instantly center the camera on their subject.
